text: The actor Ichikawa Benzō as the page Kichisaburō in the play Yaoya Oshichi koi no edozome 八百屋お七恋江戸染, performed at the Nakamura Theater, in the fifth month of 1766
title: Actor Ichikawa Benzō as the Page Kichisaburō
